scripts.hc:alice: cd ../dnas/lobby && hc sandbox generate workdir/happ/ -r=8888 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.hc:bob: cd ../dnas/lobby && hc sandbox generate workdir/happ/ -r=8889 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.hc:charlie: cd ../dnas/lobby && hc sandbox generate workdir/happ/ -r=8899 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.hc:david: cd ../dnas/lobby && hc sandbox generate workdir/happ/ -r=8800 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.hc:emma: cd ../dnas/lobby && hc sandbox generate workdir/happ/ -r=8811 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.hc-rmt-prxy:alice: cd .. && RUST_LOG=info hc sandbox generate workdir-fixed/happ/ -r=8888 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://0B0aIe8BtorZ2mY1TvxpZsyNgZ72yhqx9-WIeqUJN2Y/kitsune-quic/h/52.194.238.234/p/33548/--
scripts.hc-rmt-prxy:bob: cd .. && RUST_LOG=info hc sandbox generate workdir-fixed/happ/ -r=8889 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://0B0aIe8BtorZ2mY1TvxpZsyNgZ72yhqx9-WIeqUJN2Y/kitsune-quic/h/52.194.238.234/p/33548/--
scripts.hc-rmt-prxy:charlie: cd ../dnas/lobby && RUST_LOG=info hc sandbox generate workdir/happ/ -r=8899 network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://0B0aIe8BtorZ2mY1TvxpZsyNgZ72yhqx9-WIeqUJN2Y/kitsune-quic/h/52.194.238.234/p/33548/--
scripts.build-happ: cd ../dnas/lobby && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack workdir/dna && hc app pack workdir/happ && rm -rf ~/tmp && mkdir ~/tmp && hc s clean
scripts.demo: concurrently "npm run hc:alice" "npm run hc:bob" "npm run hc:charlie" "ENV=HC npm run ui:alice" "ENV=HC npm run ui:bob" "ENV=HC npm run ui:charlie"
scripts.demo-2: concurrently "npm run hc:alice" "npm run hc:bob"  "npm run ui:alice" "npm run ui:bob"
scripts.demo-4: concurrently "npm run hc:alice" "npm run hc:bob" "npm run hc:charlie" "npm run hc:david"  "npm run ui:alice" "npm run ui:bob" "npm run ui:charlie" "npm run ui:david"
scripts.demo-5: concurrently "npm run hc:alice" "npm run hc:bob" "npm run hc:charlie" "npm run hc:david" "npm run hc:emma" "ENV=HC npm run ui:alice" "ENV=HC npm run ui:bob" "ENV=HC npm run ui:charlie" "ENV=HC npm run ui:david" "ENV=HC npm run ui:emma"
scripts.demo-rmt-prxy-alice: concurrently "npm run hc-rmt-prxy:alice" "ENV=HC npm run ui:alice"
scripts.demo-rmt-prxy-bob: concurrently "npm run hc-rmt-prxy:bob" "ENV=HC npm run ui:bob"
scripts.start-holochain: cd ../dnas/lobby && hc sandbox -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate -r=$HC_PORT workdir/happ/ --app-id=$APP_ID network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.start-holo-alice: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-alice" "ADMIN_PORT=9000 APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL HC_PORT=8888 npm run start-holochain"  "ENV=HCC APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL CHAPERONE_PORT=24273 npm run ui:alice"
scripts.start-holo-bob: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-bob" "ADMIN_PORT=9001 APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL HC_PORT=8889 npm run start-holochain"  "ENV=HCC APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL CHAPERONE_PORT=24274 npm run ui:bob"
scripts.start-holo-charlie: concurrently -k "npm:chaperone-charlie" "ADMIN_PORT=9002 APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL HC_PORT=8890 npm run start-holochain"  "ENV=HCC APP_ID=uhCkkHSLbocQFSn5hKAVFc_L34ssLD52E37kq6Gw9O3vklQ3Jv7eL CHAPERONE_PORT=24275 npm run ui:charlie"
scripts.ios: npx cap sync ios && npx cap copy ios && npx cap open ios
